description: The BR-30 Regional Transport Office (DTO) is the designated authority for vehicle registration and licensing in the Sitamarhi district of Bihar. Located at the Collectorate Building in Dumra, it manages transport administration for the entire district under the Tirhut Division. The office plays a vital role in road safety and revenue collection for a region that is geographically significant due to its proximity to the Nepal border and culturally revered as the birthplace of Goddess Sita.
address: District Transport Office, Collectorate Building, Dumra Road, Sitamarhi, Bihar
